Latest News & Announcements

Stay Updated with School Happenings

20 Feb
Important Notice

Mid-Term Break - Term 1, 2026

As we approach the mid-term break, we are grateful for everything we have achieved so far this term. We wish all our learners, parents, and staff a restful and happy break.

School Closure: Friday, February 25, 2026

Resumption: Monday, March 2, 2026

Important Reminders for Parents:
  • Teacher Follow-ups: Parents are requested to schedule follow-up meetings with respective class teachers to discuss their children's academic progress and behaviour during the break period.
  • Fee Balance: Parents are kindly advised to clear any outstanding fee balances before resumption on March 2nd to ensure smooth operation and avoid any disruption in learning.

For inquiries, contact the school office: +254 727 345 438
